basics.name: Jean Claude Ntambara
basics.label: Incoming Computer Science New Grad
basics.summary: An aspring Software Engineer with over 2+ years of experience working as a Software Developer and Automation Engineer intern

work.name: Acxiom LLC, Conway Arkansas
highlights: Engineered an automated deployment pipeline reducing manual deployment through implementing weekly automated pull requests using Jenkins and GitHub API integration.
Spearheaded real-time development communications by architecting a Slack integration system that broadcasts Jenkins build statuses, enabling immediate individual or team response to build issues.
Led end-to-end ownership of Cloud Docs projects CI/CD processes, developing custom JavaScript-based remark linting rules that improved documentation consistency.
Implemented robust code review protocols by establishing mandatory codeowner approvals, resulting in a significant reduction in production-environment issues.
Completely modified Cloud Docs platform's user interface using HTML, JavaScript, and CSS. The new UI/UX resulted in a user satisfaction boost and significantly improved documentation accessibility.
Mentored 5+ new hires and interns through comprehensive Cloud Docs onboarding sessions, reducing ramp-up time from one week to 3 days and achieving 100% team autonomy in project contributions.
Authored and maintained cloud template tutorials accessed by Acxiom cloud engineers, resulting in faster template implementation across teams.
Orchestrated containerization of Cloud Docs platform using Docker and Kubernetes, creating Helm Charts and implementing harbor registry integration, improving the scalability of the site.

work.name: SEO Technology Track, Virtual
work.position: Tech Developer and SEO EDGE Participant
highlights: Participated in a long-term career preparation and mentorship program to develop technical and career skills.
Completed 300+ hours of technology focused training on software development, databases, testing, and implementation.
Designed web applications using Python, HTML, CSS, and MySQL to retrieve API data that responds to user needs.

work.name: Hendrix College, Conway Arkansas
highlights: CSCI 150 Teaching Assistant (Lab Grader) (Sept 2022 -- May 2023) Provided feedback to over 60 computer science students taking an introductory level course on how to fix and/or improve their code and programming style where needed. Reviewed and graded the submitted Python code for the weekly labs using PyCharm, Jupyter notebook and Microsoft Excel.

Information Technology Helpdesk Support (Feb 2021 -- May 2023) Helped in processing requests of the College's ticket management system using ServicePRO, troubleshot software, helped resolve WiFi and computer hardware issues, and set up all collegeâ€™s tech-related events. Answered phone calls from faculty, staff, and students to provide friendly and efficient tech support campus wide.

awards.title: Acxiom Diversity Scholarship '23 Recipient
awards.summary: Acxiom's Diversity Scholarship Initiative offers $5000 scholarships to benefit 10 diverse students who are enrolled full-time in a post-secondary degree program in Computer Science or related areas of study in the United States.
